document.full_text: china rescued tibet from thousands of years of feudal serfdom, the region's chinese-appointed governor said on thursday ahead of commemorations marking six decades of communist party rule.
document.title: china says 60 years of development saved tibet from feudalism
lines_and_colors: china rescued tibet from thousands of years of feudal serfdom, the region's chinese-appointed governor said on thursday ahead of commemorations marking six decades of communist party rule.
